text: Tiger King: Murder, Mayhem and Madness, or simply Tiger King, is a 2020 true crime documentary miniseries. It is about the life of Joe Exotic. It was released on Netflix on March 20, 2020. The series focuses on the conflict of big cat conservationist Carole Baskin, owner of Big Cat Rescue, and collector Exotic. The show quickly became one of the most watched shows on the Netflix platform. title: Tiger King
